Package edu.xtec.jclic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constants
    Definition of some global constants widely used in JClic.
    PlayStation
    A PlayStation is a container for activities.
    RunnableComponent
    Interface used to represent complex objects that can be handled by containers of type SingleInstanceJFrame.
    TestPlayerContainer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activity
    Activity is the abstract base class for JClic activities.

    CopyActivityAttributesPanel  
    ExtendedPlayer  
    HelpActivityComponent
    JClic activities have the pottibility to show a dialog window containig an object with help contents.
    Player
    Player is one of the the main classes of the JClic system.
    PlayerHistory
    PlayerHistory uses a Stack object to store the list of projects and activities done by the user.
    PlayerSettings  
    PlayerSettingsDlg  
    SingleInstanceJFrame
